an9.19:4.1: “Imañca, bhikkhave, rattiṃ sambahulā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an9.19:4.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, bhikkhave, tā devatā maṃ etadavocuṃ:
an9.19:4.4: ‘upasaṅkamiṃsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhūtānaṃ pabbajitā agārāni.
an9.19:4.5: Te mayaṃ, bhante, paccuṭṭhimha, no ca kho abhivādimha.
an9.19:4.6: Tā mayaṃ, bhante, aparipuṇṇakammantā vippaṭisāriniyo paccānutāpiniyo hīnaṃ kāyaṃ upapannā’ti.
an9.19:5.1: Aparāpi maṃ, bhikkhave, sambahulā devatā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
an9.19:5.2: ‘upasaṅkamiṃsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhūtānaṃ pabbajitā agārāni.
an9.19:5.3: Te mayaṃ, bhante, paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha, no ca tesaṃ āsanaṃ adamha.
an9.19:5.4: Tā mayaṃ, bhante, aparipuṇṇakammantā vippaṭisāriniyo paccānutāpiniyo hīnaṃ kāyaṃ upapannā’ti.
an9.19:6.1: Aparāpi maṃ, bhikkhave, sambahulā devatā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
an9.19:6.2: ‘upasaṅkamiṃsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhūtānaṃ pabbajitā agārāni.
an9.19:6.3: Te mayaṃ, bhante, paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha āsanaṃ adamha, no ca kho yathāsatti yathābalaṃ saṃvibhajimha … pe …
an9.19:6.4: yathāsatti yathābalaṃ saṃvibhajimha, no ca kho upanisīdimha dhammassavanāya … pe …
an9.19:6.5: upanisīdimha dhammassavanāya, no ca kho ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇimha … pe …
an9.19:6.6: ohitasotā ca dhammaṃ suṇimha, no ca kho sutvā dhammaṃ dhārayimha … pe …
an9.19:6.7: sutvā ca dhammaṃ dhārayimha, no ca kho dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhimha … pe …
an9.19:6.8: dhātānañca dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhimha, no ca kho atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjimha.
an9.19:6.9: Tā mayaṃ, bhante, aparipuṇṇakammantā vippaṭisāriniyo paccānutāpiniyo hīnaṃ kāyaṃ upapannā’ti.
an9.19:7.1: Aparāpi maṃ, bhikkhave, sambahulā devatā upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ:
an9.19:7.2: ‘upasaṅkamiṃsu no, bhante, pubbe manussabhūtānaṃ pabbajitā agārāni.
an9.19:7.3: Te mayaṃ, bhante, paccuṭṭhimha abhivādimha, āsanaṃ adamha, yathāsatti yathābalaṃ saṃvibhajimha, upanisīdimha dhammassavanāya, ohitasotā ca dhammaṃ suṇimha, sutvā ca dhammaṃ dhārayimha, dhātānañca dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhimha, atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjimha.
an9.19:7.4: Tā mayaṃ, bhante, paripuṇṇakammantā avippaṭisāriniyo apaccānutāpiniyo paṇītaṃ kāyaṃ upapannā’ti.
an9.19:7.6: Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha seyyathāpi tā purimikā devatā”ti.
